post.author: 이진경
post.content:
NRX Global Corp. develops and implements Equipment Data Management Solutions that helps companies in asset-intensive industries realize savings and efficiencies in maintenance planning, equipment utilization and assets management.

We are currently looking for a Senior Software Developer, part of the core development team, who will be focused to extend the server platform that NRX product operates on and who will be capable in dealing with customers to assist in deploying our software.

The candidate must have:
- solid Java programmer experience specifically J2EE using different platforms
- application server experience: IBM WebSphere (with MQ Series), Oracle 9iAS, BEA WebLogic
- database server experience: Oracle 8i/9i, IBM DB2, Microsoft SQL Server
- operating system experience: HP Unix, Solaris, IBM AIX, Linux
- familiar with standard networking and security concepts and architectures
- excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- positive, enthusiastic attitude, self-motivation
- familiarity with industrial maintenance operations would be beneficial

The position is located in downtown Toronto.
Please submit your resume and define your salary expectations.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  
Contact Information
careers@nrx.com
NRX Global Corp.
Fax: (416) 306-3388
post.title: Senior Software Developer
